overview:
Nathan is a web and mobile web application developer with ShowVine – a social TV startup based in San Francisco.

Nathan is a software developer with a history in web applications (primarily Java-based but also a fair amount of PHP) and some mobile. He works on the full web-stack doing frontend and backend development.

Aside from web applications, Nathan has worked on a variety of other projects including: creating a UAV made from off-the-shelf products to be used for reconnaissance, 3D visualizations for underwater vehicle research, and various other projects involving rapid prototyping of hardware-software systems.
